obfuscation: ﻿I will nowadays write an honest essay about my English and how I assess it .
original: ﻿I will now write an honest essay about my English and how I assess it.

obfuscation: First of all , I love to write !
original: First of all, I love to write!

obfuscation: I got very happy when I heard that we , the students in this A-level class , are going to write many essays !
original: I got very happy when I heard that we, the students in this A-level course, are going to write many essays!

obfuscation: When I see a piece of blank paper , I immediately desire to fill it with letters .
original: When I see a piece of blank paper, I immediately want to fill it with letters.

obfuscation: I rarely have any problems with spelling .
original: I seldom have any problems with spelling.

obfuscation: Once I have taken a word , I usually know how to spell it .
original: Once I have read a word, I usually know how to spell it.

obfuscation: I think it 's easier to write than to speak in many situations .
original: I think it's easier to write than to speak in many situations.

obfuscation: When I write , I can check writing for a while and just think about what I want to write further on in the text .
original: When I write, I can stop writing for a while and just think about what I want to write further on in the text.

obfuscation: When I speak it 's not that easy to stop and think about what I am supposed to say , because then the people I 'm talking to continue to speak , and the very important thing I was thinking of will never be discussed .
original: When I talk it's not that easy to stop and think about what I am supposed to say, because then the people I'm talking to continue to speak, and the very important thing I was thinking of will never be discussed.

obfuscation: When I write , I can go back in the text and variety and I can change several times , so it 's very different from speaking .
original: When I write, I can go back in the text and change and I can change several times, so it's very different from speaking.

obfuscation: Maybe that is why I love to write , because I can remember in peace and quiet .
original: Maybe that is why I love to write, because I can think in peace and quiet.

obfuscation: I think I 've always loved to write , ever since I was a little girl writing in my diary every evening .
original: I guess I've always loved to write, ever since I was a little girl writing in my diary every evening.

obfuscation: When I was eleven years erstwhile our class found another class , in Great Britain , and they were about our age and we got penfriends .
original: When I was eleven years old our class found another class, in Great Britain, and they were about our age and we got penfriends.

obfuscation: I think I learnt quite a lot by writing in English to my penfriend for many years , and I however write letters , not to her though .
original: I think I learnt quite a lot by writing in English to my penfriend for many years, and I still write letters, not to her though.

obfuscation: When I studied at Komvux here in Uppsala , our English teacher told us to write an essay every week .
original: When I studied at Komvux here in Uppsala, our English teacher told us to write an essay every week.

obfuscation: It was n't compulsory but I handed in one every week because I 'm thus fond of writing , and I thought that my teacher could evaluate my English by reading my texts .
original: It wasn't compulsory but I handed in one every week because I'm so fond of writing, and I thought that my teacher could evaluate my English by reading my texts.

obfuscation: When it comes to speaking I must say that I am a fiddling bit shy of speaking in a quiet classroom with all unfamiliar students surrounding me .
original: When it comes to speaking I must say that I am a little bit shy of speaking in a quiet classroom with all unfamiliar students surrounding me.

obfuscation: In such situations my English does n't sound like I want it to sound .
original: In such situations my English doesn't sound like I want it to sound.

obfuscation: It 's difficult to speak fluently and spontanleously , but I know that I will practice talking in this class .
original: It's difficult to speak fluently and spontanleously, but I know that I will practice talking in this course.

obfuscation: You should visit me at home and spy on me when I 'm doing my homework , because I practically constantly read aloud to myself to get the right pronunciation by reading the phonetics .
original: You should visit me at home and spy on me when I'm doing my homework, because I practically always read aloud to myself to get the right pronunciation by reading the phonetics.

obfuscation: It 's a habit to read aloud , but I do n't know if it 's a full or a bad habit .
original: It's a habit to read aloud, but I don't know if it's a good or a bad habit.

obfuscation: Sometimes , when I 'm reading a book in a public place , I think it 's difficult to understand quiet and I have noticed that I move my lips secretly .
original: Sometimes, when I'm reading a book in a public place, I think it's difficult to read quiet and I have noticed that I move my lips secretly.

obfuscation: After writing comes reading , my second favorite in order .
original: After writing comes reading, my second favorite in order.

obfuscation: Naturally it depends on the text if it is readable or not , but most of the time I accept all kinds of texts .
original: Naturally it depends on the text if it is readable or not, but most of the time I accept all kinds of texts.

obfuscation: I do have to confess something , and that is that I think it 's hard to understand the paper , the news about politics and wars .
original: I do have to confess something, and that is that I think it's hard to read the paper, the news about politics and wars.

obfuscation: I remember that is like listening to the news on the TV or the radio .
original: I think that is like listening to the news on the TV or the radio.

obfuscation: They use a unlike language from the language they often write in literature .
original: They use a different language from the language they often write in literature.

obfuscation: But I am aware of my defect , so at the moment I subscribe to Newsweek where I can take international news about Clinton 's counterattac and the Olympics scandal ( That sounds boring , does n't it ? ) .
original: But I am aware of my defect, so at the moment I subscribe to Newsweek where I can read international news about Clinton's counterattac and the Olympics scandal (That sounds boring, doesn't it?).

obfuscation: Reading novels , short stories and magazines are very amusing but I find it tough to read in bed in the evening , because then I usually take the entire book which means I will be very tired the day after .
original: Reading novels, short stories and magazines are very amusing but I find it tough to read in bed in the evening, because then I usually read the entire book which means I will be very tired the day after.

obfuscation: I think it can be difficult to listen to English , but not in all situations though .
original: I think it can be difficult to listen to English, but not in all situations though.

obfuscation: I do understand the English when I attend a lecture or when I speak with a person , but when I listen to the news on the telly or the radio , I sometimes feel dazed because I do n't receive the information .
original: I do understand the English when I attend a lecture or when I speak with a person, but when I listen to the news on the telly or the radio, I sometimes feel stupid because I don't receive the information.

obfuscation: That is something I actually must practise .
original: That is something I really must practise.
